name: agent
content:
<situation name="{SITNAME}" mapAllAttributes="Y">
      <class name="{EIF_CLASS}" />
      <slot slotName="msg">
        <literalString value="Log File Missing : $KLO_LOG_FILE_STATUS.File_Name$" />
      </slot>
      <slot slotName="file_status">
        <mappedAttribute name="KLO_LOG_FILE_STATUS.File_Status" />
      </slot>
      <slot slotName="file_name">
        <mappedAttribute name="KLO_LOG_FILE_STATUS.File_Name" />
      </slot>
      <slot slotName="profile">
        <literalString value="gti_rhb_base" />
      </slot>
    </situation>
